text:
Does anyone know if we can edit this email module named 'Social'? I can't seem to find it anywhere in the Design Tools or the Boilerplate theme. There are several similar modules named Social Follow, Social Share, Follow Me, etc -- but those are not the same.

I specifically want to be able to change the color of the social icons to match the branding colors. Though, I cannot seem to edit color nor add additional icon variants.
